snippet: The unemployment numbers and other recent reports show signs of economic momentum after an unusually harsh winter.
abstract: Labor Department reports that applications for weekly unemployment benefits dropped 32,000 to seasonally adjusted 300,0000, lowest level in nearly seven years; data strengthens views of faster job growth.
lead_paragraph: The unemployment numbers and other recent reports show signs of economic momentum after an unusually harsh winter.

headline.main: Unemployment Claims Decline to Nearly a 7-Year Low
headline.print_headline: Unemployment Claims Decline to Nearly a 7-Year Low
